long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your sales performance with Bigtincan for Gmail. Seamlessly find and share relevant and engaging content with your customers directly within Gmail.


Tired of wasting time searching for the right sales collateral? Bigtincan for Gmail integrates seamlessly with your Bigtincan account, giving you instant access to your entire content library without ever leaving your inbox.


Key Features:
- Intelligent Recommendations: Surface the most relevant and engaging content for each customer based on the email context.
- Effortless Search: Quickly find the files you need with powerful search capabilities.
- One-Click Sharing: Attach content directly to your emails with a single click.
- Marketing-Approved Templates: Choose from your library of HTML and plain text email templates your team has created, then edit for your customer.
- Performance Tracking: Gain valuable insights into how your prospects engage with your content. Track opens and downloads to measure the effectiveness of your outreach.


Benefits:
- Close deals faster: Equip yourself with the right content at the right time to drive conversions.
- Increase engagement: Share compelling content that captures your prospects' attention.
- Maximize productivity: Streamline your workflow and save valuable time.
- Jumpstart writing and stay on brand: Draft even quicker by using your teamâ€™s email templates.
- Data-driven insights: Track content performance to optimize your sales strategy.


Bigtincan is the ultimate tool for sales professionals who want to:
- Increase sales efficiency
- Improve email engagement
- Gain a competitive edge
